Package index

All functions

PET_norm()
Probability of early termination using normal density
RMST_sim_cal()
Estimation of RMST values in each group
RMST_sim_test()
Single stage RMST test using simulation. P-value and cut off tau adjustment times
adp_grid_src()
Adaptive grid search for critical value using RMST (Simple or Sculpted)
compare_line_plot()
Plotting the comparison of 3 methods
expo_gen_2stages()
Generate the 2 stages survival data under exponential or piecewise exponential distribution
find_m_logrank()
Find the critical value of two-stage log-rank test
log_rank_sim()
Log-rank test simulation. P-value and z-statistics
mu_cov_mc()
Mean and variance estimation of RMST using Monte-Carlo
theo_RMST()
Theoretical value of RMST (exponential distribution)

Developed by Jiashan He.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.1.
